original_title: A Masque of Madness (Notes on Film 06-B, Monologue 02)
overview: In this experimental film, British actor Boris Karloff (1887-1969) embodies over 170 characters, experiencing a schizophrenic horror trip in which he faces versions of himself in different masks, at different ages, of different genders and races. As Karloffâ€™s career spans over 50 years, from the silent era to modern-day cinema, A Masque of Madness allows us to witness the aesthetic and technical developments of the medium in one single film.
title: A Masque of Madness (Notes on Film 06-B, Monologue 02)
